001package _Delaunay;
002
003import java.util.Random;
004
005import ij.ImagePlus;
006import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
007import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
008
009public class Make_Random_Points implements PlugIn {
010        
011        static int size = 400;
012        static int NumberOfPoints = 1000;
013
014        @Override
015        public void run(String arg) {
016                ByteProcessor ip = new ByteProcessor(size, size);
017                Random rg = new Random();
018                
019                for (int i = 0; i < NumberOfPoints; i++) {
020                        int x = rg.nextInt(size);
021                        int y = rg.nextInt(size);
022                        ip.set(x, y, 255);
023                }
024                
025                (new ImagePlus("Random", ip)).show();
026        }
027
028}
